name: polythene
description: Polymer inspired modular implementation of Material Design for Mithril.

scripts.watch-css: node scripts/watch-scss.js polythene/ & node scripts/watch-scss.js polythene-theme/
scripts.watch-es6: node scripts/watch-es6.js polythene/ & node scripts/watch-es6.js polythene-theme/
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-es6
scripts.transpile-css: node scripts/watch-scss.js polythene/ null once && node scripts/watch-scss.js polythene-theme/ null once
scripts.transpile-js: node scripts/watch-es6.js polythene/ null once && node scripts/watch-es6.js polythene-theme/ null once
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile-css && npm run transpile-js
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf external_modules && rimraf polythene/deps/ && find ./lib -name "*.js" -not -name "*.es6.js" -print | xargs rimraf && find ./lib -name "*.css" -print | xargs rimraf

author: Arthur Clemens
